  • Changelog

    genes.by.hallmark.pathway

    genes.by.hallmark.pathway.Rd

    A hallmark pathway gene set from x <- readLines("h.all.v7.5.1.symbols.gmt") res <- strsplit(x, "\t") names(res) <- vapply(res, function(y) y[1], character(1)) genes.by.hallmark.pathway <- lapply(res, "[", -c(1:2))

    Usage

    data(genes.by.hallmark.pathway)

    Format

    list

    Examples

    data(genes.by.hallmark.pathway)
str(genes.by.hallmark.pathway)
#> List of 50
